title: Bugsplat after champ select
body: So my hard drive crashed about a month ago and I had to purchase a new one and reinstall EVERYTHING. I played 2 games about a week ago. The first game was fine Perfect FPS and everything. Second game my fps wouldn't go above 30. The next day after champ select I would get the dreaded BUGSPLAT going into the loading screen. I've tried renaming the Logitech files and still nothing. Before league was working fine and I never really had any problems unless my internet was poop. If anyone has had similar problems please let me know! I've read about the bugsplat like this from 2011-2015, but still couldn't find any info. Also I've reinstalled League and it still didn't help.

replies.body:
This may be caused by the Windows Game Bar which was recently updated by the Anniversary windows updates to perform *Game DVR*. I recommend [disabling this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to ensure it isn't causing the issue for you.

Let me know if this helped.
I have the same problem. Your tip didn't help unfortunate.

In that case, I suggest taking a look at our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), which covers the most common solutions for this.

If that resolved this, please let me know.
